Title: Anne Frank Remembered
Actors: Kenneth Branagh, Janny Brandes-Brilslijper, Glenn Close, Rose De Liema
Plot: Using previously unreleased archival material in addition to contemporary interviews, this academy award-winning documentary tells the story of the Frank family and presents the first fully-rounded portrait of their brash and free-spirited daughter Anne, perhaps the world's most famous victim of the Holocaust.
